snippet: Nazih Abdul-Hamed al-Ruqai, apprehended by American forces this weekend in Tripoli, Libya, was enjoying being home with his family for the first time in years, his son said in an interview.
abstract: Abdullah al-Ruqai, son of Nazih Abdul-Hamed al-Ruqai, describes the short period of calm that was interrupted by his father's capture by the United States during a raid on their home in Tripoli, Libya; Ruqai is said to have pulled his wife, four sons and a daughter through war zones and at least six countries over 20 years.
lead_paragraph: Nazih Abdul-Hamed al-Ruqai, apprehended by American forces this weekend in Tripoli, Libya, was enjoying being home with his family for the first time in years, his son said in an interview.

headline.main: After Years on Run, Libyan Was Found With Family
headline.print_headline: After Years on Run, Libyan Was Found With Family
